I’m sorry. This will be a dangerous battle.\""},{"lineNumber":39282,"originalJapaneseLine":"「と、とんでもありません！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"N-no, not at all!\""},{"lineNumber":39283,"originalJapaneseLine":"「どうぞ、お心のままに。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Please, act according to your wishes."},{"lineNumber":39284,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ガンジー様のお気持ちに添うのを許された事が、","translatedEnglishLine":"To be allowed to follow Lord Gandhi’s feelings,"},{"lineNumber":39285,"originalJapaneseLine":"　何よりの喜びですわ」","translatedEnglishLine":"is my greatest joy.\""},{"lineNumber":39286,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うむ……ならば往こう。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes... Then let us go."},{"lineNumber":39287,"originalJapaneseLine":"　次だ、スケさん、カクさん」","translatedEnglishLine":"Next up, Suke-san, Kaku-san.\""},{"lineNumber":39288,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はい！　ガンジー様！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes! Lord Gandhi!\""},{"lineNumber":39289,"originalJapaneseLine":"「次の魔軍の宿営地、調べております。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I have located the next stronghold of the demon army."},{"lineNumber":39290,"originalJapaneseLine":"　どうぞこちらへ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Please come this way.\""},{"lineNumber":39291,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………外道ども……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"... You fiends..."},{"lineNumber":39292,"originalJapaneseLine":"　必ずや、鉄槌を下してくれるぞ……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"I will surely bring down the hammer of justice on you...!\""},{"lineNumber":39293,"originalJapaneseLine":"怒りに震える言葉を残し、","translatedEnglishLine":"Leaving words trembling with anger,"},{"lineNumber":39294,"originalJapaneseLine":"ガンジーは次の目的地へと旅だった。","translatedEnglishLine":"Gandhi departed toward the next destination."},{"lineNumber":39295,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……ん？　何だありゃ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"... Hm? What's that?\""},{"lineNumber":39296,"originalJapaneseLine":"ふと、ランスの足が止まった。","translatedEnglishLine":"Suddenly, Lance's steps came to a halt."},{"lineNumber":39297,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔物兵だった。","translatedEnglishLine":"They were demon soldiers."},{"lineNumber":39298,"originalJapaneseLine":"それが、折り重なるようにして倒れている。","translatedEnglishLine":"They lay collapsed, piled up on each other."},{"lineNumber":39299,"originalJapaneseLine":"「数は……だいたい、400くらい、だけど……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The number is... roughly around 400, but...\""},{"lineNumber":39300,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お昼寝中……でしょうか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Are they... taking a nap?\""},{"lineNumber":39301,"originalJapaneseLine":"「よーし……こっそり近寄って、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Alright... let's sneak closer,"},{"lineNumber":39302,"originalJapaneseLine":"　不意打ちでボスをぶっ殺すぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"and surprise attack the boss.\""},{"lineNumber":39303,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス達は手頃な草むら伝いに近寄ってみるが、","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance and the others approached along a convenient patch of grass,"},{"lineNumber":39304,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔軍に動きはない。","translatedEnglishLine":"but there was no movement from the demon army."},{"lineNumber":39305,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………なんか変だな？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"... Something's strange, isn't it?\""},{"lineNumber":39306,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……待ってランス。毒の臭いがする」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Wait, Lance. I smell poison.\""},{"lineNumber":39307,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はあ？　全然分からな……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh? I don’t smell anything at all...\""},{"lineNumber":39308,"originalJapaneseLine":"うぇっほ、げほがほ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"‘Ugh, cough, cough!'\""},{"lineNumber":39309,"originalJapaneseLine":"風に乗って、死臭と異臭がランスの鼻に直撃した。","translatedEnglishLine":"The wind carried the stench of death and a foul odor directly into Lance's nose."},{"lineNumber":39310,"originalJapaneseLine":"「げほっ、おぇっ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Cough, ugh..."},{"lineNumber":39311,"originalJapaneseLine":"　なんだ、あいつら死んでるのか」","translatedEnglishLine":"What, are those guys dead?\""},{"lineNumber":39312,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そのようですね。死亡確認です」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It seems so. Confirmed dead.\""},{"lineNumber":39313,"originalJapaneseLine":"「毒殺か……見ろ香ちゃん。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Poisoned to death... look, Ka-chan."},{"lineNumber":39314,"originalJapaneseLine":"　どいつもこいつも香ちゃんの団子食った時みたいに","translatedEnglishLine":"They’re all foaming at the mouth like when you ate those dumplings, Ka-chan."},{"lineNumber":39315,"originalJapaneseLine":"　口から泡吹いてるぞ。がははははは！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Foaming at the mouth, haha ha ha ha ha!\""},{"lineNumber":39316,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そっ、そんなにひどくないですー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I-it’s not that bad!\""},{"lineNumber":39317,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスは半泣きになった香姫にぺちぺち叩かれながら、","translatedEnglishLine":"While being lightly smacked by a teary-eyed Ka-hime,"},{"lineNumber":39318,"originalJapaneseLine":"何事もなかったように進み始めた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance began to move forward as if nothing had happened."},{"lineNumber":39319,"originalJapaneseLine":"「毒……誰がこんなに大勢、毒で倒したんでしょう」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Poison... who could have taken down so many with poison?\""},{"lineNumber":39320,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ん……おお？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm... oh?\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 己の烈気を落ち着けようと、肩でひとつ息をする。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He took a breath through his shoulders to calm his own fiery spirit.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お疲れ様です、ガンジー様。
これで魔物将軍、3体目ですね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This makes the third demon general defeated, right?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うむ。そちらも怪我はないか」
「はい、深刻なものは。
……それと、ランスさんがゼスに入られたとの事」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ... Also, I heard that Lance has entered Zeth."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おお……そうか、うむ。それは頼もしい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh... I see, yes. That is reassuring.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私では、魔人は手が出ぬからな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I cannot handle the demons on my own..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 険しい視線で、ガンジーは自らの拳を見つめた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With a stern gaze, Gandhi looked down at his own fist.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ガンジー様……」
「……すまぬな。危険な戦いになる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "... I’m sorry. This will be a dangerous battle."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「と、とんでもありません！」
「どうぞ、お心のままに。
ガンジー様のお気持ちに添うのを許された事が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: To be allowed to follow Lord Gandhi’s feelings,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何よりの喜びですわ」
「うむ……ならば往こう。
次だ、スケさん、カクさん」
「はい！　ガンジー様！」
「次の魔軍の宿営地、調べております。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I have located the next stronghold of the demon army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうぞこちらへ」
必ずや、鉄槌を下してくれるぞ……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I will surely bring down the hammer of justice on you...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 怒りに震える言葉を残し、
ガンジーは次の目的地へと旅だった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gandhi departed toward the next destination.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……ん？　何だありゃ」
ふと、ランスの足が止まった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Suddenly, Lance's steps came to a halt.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物兵だった。
それが、折り重なるようにして倒れている。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They lay collapsed, piled up on each other.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「数は……だいたい、400くらい、だけど……」
「お昼寝中……でしょうか？」
「よーし……こっそり近寄って、
不意打ちでボスをぶっ殺すぞ」
ランス達は手頃な草むら伝いに近寄ってみるが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance and the others approached along a convenient patch of grass,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍に動きはない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but there was no movement from the demon army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「…………なんか変だな？」
「……待ってランス。毒の臭いがする」
「はあ？　全然分からな……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Huh? I don’t smell anything at all..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うぇっほ、げほがほ！」
風に乗って、死臭と異臭がランスの鼻に直撃した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The wind carried the stench of death and a foul odor directly into Lance's nose.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「げほっ、おぇっ……
なんだ、あいつら死んでるのか」
「そのようですね。死亡確認です」
「毒殺か……見ろ香ちゃん。
どいつもこいつも香ちゃんの団子食った時みたいに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They’re all foaming at the mouth like when you ate those dumplings, Ka-chan.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 口から泡吹いてるぞ。がははははは！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Foaming at the mouth, haha ha ha ha ha!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そっ、そんなにひどくないですー！」
ランスは半泣きになった香姫にぺちぺち叩かれながら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: While being lightly smacked by a teary-eyed Ka-hime,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何事もなかったように進み始めた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance began to move forward as if nothing had happened.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「毒……誰がこんなに大勢、毒で倒したんでしょう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Poison... who could have taken down so many with poison?"

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
